scripts.hugo:build: hugo --configDir src/config -e build --cleanDestinationDir -D -F -v & echo Done! The development build is available under /build.
scripts.hugo:test: hugo --configDir src/config -e test --cleanDestinationDir --gc & echo Done! Check the build under /test.
scripts.hugo:public: hugo --configDir src/config -e public --cleanDestinationDir --gc --enableGitInfo --minify & echo Done! Your website is now fully rendered under /public.
scripts.clean:all: rimraf resources/* & npm run clean:build & npm run clean:test & npm run clean:public
scripts.deploy: echo 'commit the production build and push to github. Or any other publishing command...'
